main.name: Jonathan Stillman
main.description: I am a Full Stack Web Developer
main.bio: My name is Jonathan Stillman and I am a Full Stack Web Developer graduate from Vanderbilt University. My hobbies include traveling, photography, music production and playing soccer. My future goal would be to become a Software Engineer for a reputable company.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in any of my works or services, please contact me.

resume.skillmessage: These are a set of skills that I have either learned or feel comfortable in using.

education.description: During my school career, I was able to learn the process of what it takes to become a Full Stack Web Developer. From this I learned everything from better improving my basic coding skills to implementing them and designing an entire website.
My experience in this course was to learn Database Management. In a couple of my classes, I had to use php as well as MySQL to manage our assignments that were given to us.

work.title: CMC Technician
work.description: My job here was to create Airplane parts that would eventually be shipped to Boeing as well as other big manufacturing plants. Though not receiving any notable rewards, I was praised by higher up positions on my work ethic and leadership skills. From this, I had a great opportunity to be promoted to a higher position.

work.title: Assembly Worker
work.description: My job here was to run various parts to different lines through out the plant. From this, I was valued for my work ethic and for information given at meetings. In upon leaving, the plant leader himself tried to convince me to stay due to how valuable I was to them.

projects.title: Music Player
projects.category: Vandy Music Player where users can look up songs and save them to a playlist

projects.title: Hearthstone Card App
projects.category: Another project from me in collaboration with others from my team.

projects.title: Google Book Search
projects.category: This is a book search app created using React. You can also save books that you are interested in.

projects.title: Eat Da Hamburger
projects.category: This app allows the user to create and eat burgers using MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and ORM.
